attributes.action: Please give Joe Wicks an MBE
attributes.additional_details:
His initiative will undoubtedly have a long lasting impact on people’s lives -
well after we get out of lockdown. It’s not only the impact on the nation’s fitness but on mental health too. He has had over 70 million views worldwide. He is a real inspiration to young and old alike. This is a real positive coming out of lockdown and something that won’t be forgotten. Recognise him for taking the initiative and sticking with it. He’s been absolutely fantastic!
attributes.background: Please consider recognising Joe Wicks for his fantastic initiative of PE with Joe during lockdown. He gave his own time religiously over 13 weeks - inspiring children and families across the world to get fit during the Covid 19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions calling for people to be given honours.

You can find out how to nominate people here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
